id.description: The unique identifier of the virtual bank account

customer_id.description: The unique identifier of the customer associated with the virtual bank account

email.description: The email address associated with the customer's virtual bank account

scheme.description: The scheme or type of the virtual bank account

bank_name.description: The name of the bank of the virtual bank account

account_number.description: The virtual bank account number associated with the customer

routing_number.description: The routing number associated with the virtual bank account

swift_code.description: The SWIFT code associated with the virtual bank account

gateway.description: The payment gateway used for processing transactions with this virtual bank account

resource_version.description: The version of the virtual bank account resource

updated_at.description: The date and time when the virtual bank account was last updated

created_at.description: The date and time when the virtual bank account was created

reference_id.description: A reference identifier linked to the virtual bank account

deleted.description: Flag indicating if the virtual bank account has been deleted

custom_fields.description: Any custom fields or additional information related to the virtual bank account
